ProjectTitle: Multiple sclerosis immunogenetics: moving to multimodal single-cell resolution
InitialFeedbackHistory: 07/06/2024 [REDACTED] your ethical approval numbers are a bit older, do these include a recent privacy check and is the use of data and materials for the work in this project covered? [REDACTED] more information see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/ethics/committees and https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index [REDACTED] [REDACTED] you use human data and material, privacy may be a factor restricting sharing, when sharing genetic/genomic data there may still be a possibility to identify the subjects, this kind of data can be shared in EGA (https://ega-archive.org/) under restricted access; you can find more information here: https://www.uzleuven.be/nl/dac
